meanings.definition: The stage of human social development and organization that is considered most advanced.
meanings.sent1: Ancient civilizations built impressive structures like pyramids and temples.
meanings.sent2: Many civilizations have developed written languages to communicate.
meanings.sent3: The civilizations of ants and bees are fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent4: In the vast civilization of the internet, information flows freely.
meanings.sent5: The rise and fall of civilizations throughout history is a captivating subject.

meanings.definition: The society, culture, and way of life of a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The Mayan civilization had advanced knowledge in astronomy and mathematics.
meanings.sent2: Different civilizations around the world have unique traditions and customs.
meanings.sent3: The civilization of a bustling city can be overwhelming for some.
meanings.sent4: In the civilization of the Amish community, technology is limited.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the ancient Egyptian civilization reveals incredible art and architecture.
